description:
The course is will educate entrepreneurs on the elements of venture capital or angel fundraising that are usually not discussed by investors. By understanding everything from the fundraising process to how VCs do valuation math, you will gain more control over your fundraising process and outcomes. Additionally, I cover critical tactics that will enable you to compel investors to make decisions and take action.

About the Instructor:

The instructor, Mark Peter Davis ("MPD") is a venture capitalist, serial entrepreneur and the author of The Fundraising Rules. He has raised venture capital, co-founded, incubated or invested in ~50 companies, including Coinbase, MakeSpace, SailThru, Warby Parker and others. MPD currently is the Managing Partner of Interplay, an incubator and investment firm.

Interplay has incubated numerous companies including: DevSpark, Founder Shield, Nomad Financial, Truman James, TwentyPine and Venwise.

In this course he delves into the the venture capital fundraising process sharing color and insights that will give entrepreneurs a better understanding of how to play the game and win.
title: The Secrets of Raising Venture Capital
